About

  • Easily calculate IOUs for your shared costs with this Google Wave gadget.
  • Calculations can be over multiple currencies.
  • Settle outstanding IOUs using PayPal.
  • Who-owes-Who is currently in early beta testing, your data is volatile!
  • Developed by Phil Miller. Feedback most welcome at admin --at-- skabenga dot com
  • User interface source code is available at http://github.com/idrop/wow-ui

Terms and Conditions

The Who-owes-Who.com website has been made available free of charge in the hope that it will be useful to anybody wishing to calculate IOU's between friends. Although the Who-owes-Who.com website has been tested successfully using a range of test data, the software that performs the calculations is relatively complex, which means that it is possible under certain circumstances for the calculations to be incorrect. The calculations performed on Who-owes-Who.com must therefore be used at your own risk. There is no warranty, and no liability or responsibility can be accepted for any losses incurred by anyone using the information, or facilities, available on the Who-owes-Who.com website.

Any bugs that are reported will be investigated and fixed where possible, and over time users may come to gain a high degree of confidence in the availability, reliability and accuracy of the calculations performed on the Who-owes-Who,com website, and although these are all important aims for the website, none of them are guaranteed.

Privacy Policy

Personal data outside of that necessary to perform calculations are not stored on the Who-owes-Who,com website. User information is obtained via Google Wave APIs. All data stored on the Who-owes-Who.com website are stored against a user's Google Wave identity.
